Articles.Content: I can't place a command pod, it's greyed out. It says I need to make an entry level purchase in R&D, so I went and checked it out.... I see all the basic stuff I should already have, but there's an option to re-research the command pod for 0 points, so I do so, go back to the VAB/SPH and still cannot select or place the command pod. What the heck am I doing wrong? I even did a fresh reinstall and still no joy, am I missing something, is my copy bugged all to hell? Really can't figure it out on my own, quick reply would be greatly appreciated
Im having the same problem, do you have mods installed?

I had the same problem but have just managed to fix it!!!

I had deleted all mods prior to the update so everything would run smoothly (or so was the plan). I had forgot, however, to delete the pods in my KSP/parts folder. I don't know if I was supposed to put them in that folder back when i got MechJeb, but it worked. Once they were gone the command pod was available in the VAB
I found that completely deleting the game and reinstalling it fixed the issue for me.
